trans-unit.source: Represents a custom binding element that supports mixed-mode security (such as, optimized message security over a secure transport).
trans-unit.target: 代表支援混合模式安全性 (例如，透過安全傳輸的最佳化訊息安全性) 的自訂繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack is added second, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 自訂繫結包含以特定順序排列的繫結項目的集合：第一個先新增代表繫結堆疊頂端的項目，第二個新增繫結堆疊中的次一項目，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: To add this class to a binding
trans-unit.target: 若要將這個類別加入至繫結

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Create custom binding elements that will be above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 建立在繫結堆疊中位於此繫結項目上方的自訂繫結項目，例如選擇性的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: Add these elements in the previously mentioned order to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 依先前所述的順序，使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> 方法將這些項目加入至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> and add it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement> 的執行個體，並將它新增至集合。

trans-unit.source: Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 將其他任何自訂繫結項目新增至集合中，例如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Once an instance of this object is created, you should treat the properties of its base class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>, as immutable.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**一旦建立此物件的執行個體之後，您應該將其基底類別的屬性<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>、 當做不變。

trans-unit.source: Calling `set` on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a run-time failure being the only indication of an issue.
trans-unit.target: 在某些屬性上呼叫 `set` 可能會產生無法預測的結果：繫結的行為可能如同屬性保留舊的值一般，而且執行階段錯誤是發生問題的唯一徵兆。

trans-unit.source: Two properties known to behave this way are <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 已知可能出現這種行為的兩個屬性是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There may be other properties for which this is true.
trans-unit.target: 另外可能還有其他屬性也會出現同樣的狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportSecurityBindingElement" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> object initialized from the current class.
trans-unit.target: 建立從現有的類別初始化的新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> object with property values equal to those of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值與目前執行個體相等的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: 這會建立目前繫結項目物件樹狀結構的完整複本 (也稱為深層複製)。

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，

trans-unit.source: (This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作也可以稱為複製整個物件圖形。傳回深層複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有傳回深層複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: 相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。

trans-unit.source: The property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a property from the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />中取得屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property from the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> or <see langword="null" /> if the object is not found.
trans-unit.target: 來自指定 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> 的屬性，如果找不到物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method gets the specified object from the base class or from one of that class's ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從基底類別或其中一個該類別的祖系取得指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object returned is usually a collection of properties, for example an object that implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件通常是屬性的集合，例如實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISecurityCapabilities> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter" /> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter" />，可以用來修改匯出處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 您可以用於插入自訂原則判斷提示的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.
trans-unit.target: 匯出關於繫結的自訂原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將繫結相關陳述式寫入 WSDL 資訊，這項資訊是由特定合約所公開，並供 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 用來將繫結堆疊中包含此自訂繫結項目的資訊傳達給用戶端。

trans-unit.source: This method takes two parameters: the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法採用兩個參數：<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。

trans-unit.source: Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> for the endpoint that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>。

trans-unit.source: This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that indicate where security policy assertions should be added.
trans-unit.target: 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為加入至 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>，指出應在何處加入安全性原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。
